column.name: fk_unit_id
column.comment: Reference to the unit of the data/observations that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: fk_first_observation_id
column.comment: Reference to the temporally first data/observation in the observation table that belongs to this dataset.

column.name: fk_last_observation_id
column.comment: Reference to the temporally last data/observation in the observation table that belongs to this dataset.
